summary: This document is a financial statement from Fifth Third Bank detailing account activity for the period of December 1, 2015, to December 31, 2015. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, and the ending balance of the account, as well as service charge details and account management information.

persons.name: Cesar Taverns
persons.context: Cesar Taverns is identified as the relationship manager for the business banking account detailed in the statement.

keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $7,675.69 and an ending balance of $11,380.06 for the statement period.
A total of $30,000 was deposited into the account during the statement period.
The document indicates a service charge of $11.00 was waived due to meeting balance criteria.
There were three checks totaling $20,933.84 processed during the statement period.
The document includes various transactions including payments to a condo association and a mortgage payment.
